original_text: And in the candlesticks shall be four bowls made like unto almonds, with their knops and their flowers.
korean_text: 등잔대 줄기에는 살구꽃 형상의 잔 넷과 꽃받침과 꽃이 있게 하고

sentences.original_text: And in the candlesticks shall be four bowls
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 촛대 안에는 네 개의 대야가 있을 것이며

sentences.original_text: with their knops and their flowers
